SELECT t.* FROM ( SELECT a.survey_no , b.SURVEY_QUS_NO , b.QUS_TYPE_CD , b.CONT , c.SURVEY_EXAMPLE_NO , c.CONT AS EX_CONT , b.ORDER_NO , c.ORDER_NO AS EX_ORDER_NO , COALESCE(d.EX_COUNT, 0) AS EX_COUNT , CASE WHEN e.SURVEY_EXAMPLE_NO IS NULL THEN FALSE ELSE TRUE END AS MINE FROM TB_SURVEY a INNER JOIN TB_SURVEY_QUESTION b ON a.SURVEY_NO = b.SURVEY_NO INNER JOIN TB_SURVEY_EXAMPLE c ON b.SURVEY_QUS_NO = c.SURVEY_QUS_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT survey_no , SURVEY_QUS_NO , SURVEY_EXAMPLE_NO , COUNT(SURVEY_EXAMPLE_NO) AS EX_COUNT FROM TB_SURVEY_ANSWER WHERE survey_no = #{surveyNo} GROUP BY survey_no, SURVEY_QUS_NO, SURVEY_EXAMPLE_NO ) d ON c.SURVEY_EXAMPLE_NO = d.SURVEY_EXAMPLE_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM TB_SURVEY_ANSWER WHERE survey_no = #{surveyNo} AND REGISTER_ID = #{registerId} ) e ON c.SURVEY_EXAMPLE_NO = e.SURVEY_EXAMPLE_NO where a.survey_no = #{surveyNo} AND a.del_yn = 'N' ) t ORDER BY t.ORDER_NO, t.EX_ORDER_NO

SELECT a.REGISTER_ID , a.REGIST_DTM , a.QUS_ANSWER_CONT , b.title , c.QUS_TYPE_CD , c.ORDER_NO , c.CONT , d.CONT AS EX_CONT , d.ORDER_NO AS EX_ORDER_NO , e.DISPLAY_NAME as REGISTER_NAME FROM TB_SURVEY_ANSWER a INNER JOIN TB_SURVEY b ON b.SURVEY_NO = a.SURVEY_NO INNER JOIN TB_SURVEY_QUESTION c ON c.SURVEY_QUS_NO = a.SURVEY_QUS_NO INNER JOIN TB_SURVEY_EXAMPLE d ON d.SURVEY_EXAMPLE_NO = a.SURVEY_EXAMPLE_NO LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_USER e ON a.REGISTER_ID = e.SID WHERE a.SURVEY_NO = #{surveyNo}
SELECT SURVEY_QUS_NO FROM TB_SURVEY_QUESTION WHERE SURVEY_NO = #{surveyNo} ORDER BY ORDER_NO
SELECT * FROM TB_SURVEY_ANSWER a LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_USER e ON a.REGISTER_ID = e.SID WHERE SURVEY_NO = #{surveyNo} GROUP BY REGISTER_ID ORDER BY a.REGIST_DTM

SELECT IFNULL(a.QUS_ANSWER_CONT, CONCAT(d.ORDER_NO, '(', d.CONT, ')')) AS QUS_ANSWER_CONT FROM TB_SURVEY_ANSWER a INNER JOIN TB_SURVEY_EXAMPLE d ON d.SURVEY_EXAMPLE_NO = a.SURVEY_EXAMPLE_NO WHERE a.SURVEY_NO = #{surveyNo} AND a.SURVEY_QUS_NO = #{surveyQusNo} AND a.REGISTER_ID = #{registerId}
